body.name: 54" Long Handled Broom and Dustpan Set - Perfect Dust Pan and Brush Combo for Efficient Cleaning, Brown and White
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 14 hrs 31 mins
features: Sturdy and Durable: This broom with dustpan combo set is made of high-quality PP plastic and iron, which is sturdy and durable, ensuring long-term use. The broom head is also not easy to break, and can effectively clean up various debris.
Easy to Assemble: The broom and dustpan set is easy to assemble without any tools. The broom handle can be adjusted to the desired length, and the dustpan can be folded for easy storage.

4 Layer Bristles: The broom features 4 layers of bristles, which are tightly packed and not easy to fall off. The bristles are soft and not easy to damage the floor, but can effectively collect dust and dirt.
Large Size: The broom is 54 inches long and the dustpan is 11 inches wide, which is large enough to cover a wide area.
Multipurpose Use: The broom and dustpan set is not only suitable for cleaning floors, but also for cleaning kitchens, bathrooms, garages, dorm, RVs and other places.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Lightweight and easy storage Lightweight A broom with two poles assembled weighs only 335g. A broom with three poles assembled weighs 375g. The dustpan weighs 460g. You can use it for a long time without getting tired, and you can easily clean it at any time. With extension pole The length of the broom can be adjusted from 39 inches to 54 inches according to your needs, and you can easily clean the corners of the ceiling. Upright Storage It can be stored neatly even in narrow corners such as the side of a refrigerator or washing machine, or a balcony.

Cleaning goods that you want to have in your new life Easy-to-grip and wall mounted The grip is made of sturdy EVA synthetic resin, which makes it easy to grip due to the flexibility and elasticity of the material, and is waterproof and has a non-slip effect. If you hang the top ring on the wall when not in use, it will not get in the way and is highly storable. Storage holder, sturdy material A holder is attached to the dustpan, so you can set the broom in the dustpan and store it when not in use. The broom and dustpan handle is made of high quality, sturdy aluminum material and is durable. 180° Rotating Head It can be easily used and cleaned in narrow spaces such as couch, table and bed. You don't have to bend over and do cleaning. The moving parts of the broom are not very loose and can be fixed at an appropriate angle when cleaning the corners, making it easy to use and will not tip over.

Rubber lip The lip of the dustpan uses a durable non-slip rubber material that sticks to the floor, so even fine dust can be swept away cleanly and dust is not released. You can disassemble and use it according to your needs. A cleaning tool that can be used in a variety of situations. 4-layer bristles It has excellent durability and can cleanly sweep even fine dust. Widen the cleaning range and make it more efficient. Flexible fibers are floor-friendly. You can also wash it with water. You can disassemble and use it according to your needs. A cleaning tool that can be used in a variety of situations. Comb design With a 1.4 inch comb-shaped filter on the dustpan, you can easily remove small items such as dust on the broom, hair and pet hair loss without using your hands. Wet sheet outlet The broom has two outlets for holding wet sheets and rags. When cleaning one corner of the ceiling, wrap the head of the broom with a wet sheet or rag to prevent spider webs and dust from falling off. * We recommend a wet sheet and rag size of 20 cm x 31 cm or more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I really like the set
reviews.reviewText: Very good quality for the price. I live in a 1/1 and this is perfect for the space, it is compact which is great for storage and it's super light weight. This is not a heavy duty set however it is of good sturdy quality, i use this before i vacuum.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This product is fabulous! I live in a studio apartment and the size is perfect! As for assembly. It was a piece of cake. Thank you 😊

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very fragile, but works
reviews.reviewText: I use this broom only for the inside of my home. It is not meant for heavy duty jobs. I have hardwood floor and this broom protects my floor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the comb feature
reviews.reviewText: Looks great in the kitchen or laundry room, does it’s job, and has amazing features. You can angle the broom which is great. And the rubber/silicon lined dust pan doesn’t let anything get past it haha. Love the comb feature so much too. Great value and I would highly recommend. (My dog chewed the broom and frayed som of the ends but still works)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice but could be better
reviews.reviewText: It’s cute and works decent. You have to put pills together for the broom and while your sweeping they start to loosen, kind of annoying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for me
reviews.reviewText: Very light weight but does the job of a larger heavier product. Perfect for me

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: First of all, this item is built cheaply, you feel it the moment the broom hits the floor that the bristles aren’t good. The broom bristles don’t catch the little stuff. Plus the head of the broom tilts, I thought it would be a neat feature for getting corners, but it’s not because the head doesn’t lock into position and it will tilt when you don’t want or need it to tilt.The bucket is also a flawed design.Look for better, go play with the options at your local store, you will find a better broom and bucket. If the price is better online, find that exact one from the store to order.I don’t suggest this product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works excellently for cleaning up heaps of pet hair, I love that I'm not having to grab all the loose animal hair off the bristles when my dog is blowing his coat. I'm not sure what other reviewers mean by heavy work, but is great for daily sweeping on hardwood floors, plus the pan holds a good amount and doesn't let it flip out of the pan because it's a covered shape, so you don't have to constantly dump the pan to resume sweeping. The broom part is somewhat narrow, but tbh that's not really been an issue for me.
